title: The Best Team Wins: Build Your Business Through Predictive Hiring
description: Reduce Hiring Risks and Predict SuccessNew Mindset . In The Best Team Wins , author Adam Robinson gives you a proven, straightforward, and effective method for hiring new employees. He teaches you how to rethink the process of finding, assessing, and hiring the right people.New Methods . Robinson, a recruiting professional with over twenty years experience, shows you how toâ€” Better Results . By following Robinson's in-depth process, you can eliminate guesswork and focus on building a team that will bring value to your company's culture and bottom line.
author: Adam    Robinson
